mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "id", PWD AS "pwd", NAME AS "name", EMAIL AS "email", PHONE AS "phone" FROM S_MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE S_MEMBER SET PWD = #{pwd}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_MEMBER (ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
